attributes.action: Coalition Government create new legislation for FREE BRITISH CITIZENSHIP, in return for minimum of 10 years British Armed Forces service for Gurkha’s,
attributes.additional_details:
We are asking the Coalition Government to create new legislation for FREE BRITISH CITIZENSHIP, in return for minimum of 10 years British Armed Forces service to the British Crown, Parliament and people.
For all Gurkha’s, Commonwealth & Allied Nation’s service personnel who served or are servicing in the British Armed Forces. As well as their families only pay 10 per cent, of British ILR / Citizenship charges too. If Gurkha soldier or Commonwealth service personnel, actually serve 20 years or more in British Armed Forces service, then British Citizenship is Free of Charge to all their family members too.
